General.Name: The Orissa Minerals Development Company Limited
General.Description: The Orissa Minerals Development Company Limited mines and markets iron ore and manganese ore in India. It also produces and sells sponge iron. The Orissa Minerals Development Company Limited was incorporated in 1918 and is headquartered in Bhubaneswar, India. The Orissa Minerals Development Company Limited is a subsidiary of Eastern Investments Limited.
